con:elements.con:expectedValue: Not Found: The request item does not exist.

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <Fault xmlns="https://mocksifapi.azurewebsites.net/sif/studentpersonal/"> <error>404</error> <when>2020-11-20T02:48:29.7748572+00:00</when> <errorstr>Not Found: The request item does not exist.</errorstr> </Fault>

con:configuration.script:
import groovy.json.JsonBuilder import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
def content = context.expand('${Properties#StudentPersonal}') def slurped = new JsonSlurper().parseText(content) def builder = new JsonBuilder(slurped)
result["StudentLocalId"] = builder.content.StudentPersonal.StudentPersonalLocalId
def newFamilyName = builder.content.StudentPersonal.PersonInfo.Name.FamilyName + '_zzz' def newGivenName = builder.content.StudentPersonal.PersonInfo.Name.GivenName + '_zzz' builder.content.StudentPersonal.PersonInfo.Name.FamilyName = newFamilyName builder.content.StudentPersonal.PersonInfo.Name.GivenName = newGivenName result["StudentPersonalNew"] = builder.toString()
result["NewFamilyName"] = newFamilyName result["NewGivenName"] = newGivenName

con:elements.con:expectedValue: The request is not valid, either add refId in request parameter for a sinlge request, or provide a valid item list format json file in request body for bulk request.
